Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Touch the resource - for folder also resources inside the folder - and optionally rewrite the content. The touch operation can write a configurable last modified date.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Set, change or reset release and expiration date. Optionally enable and configure notifications.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Configure the export behavior of the resource and select if it should be served when requested - and if so, if only via a secured connection.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Edit the content's source code directly - not via the form-based content editor.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Restore files in a folder (and optionally its subfolders) that were deleted and published after deletion.
